com.stephentuso.welcome.ui.fragments

Class TitleFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • com.stephentuso.welcome.ui.fragments.TitleFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WelcomeScreenPage.OnChangeListener

    public class TitleFragment
extends Fragment
implements WelcomeScreenPage.OnChangeListener
    A simple fragment that shows an image and a title. Use the newInstance(int, java.lang.String, boolean, java.lang.String) factory method to create an instance of this fragment.

      • onWelcomeScreenPageScrolled

        public void onWelcomeScreenPageScrolled(int pageIndex,
                               float offset,
                               int offsetPixels)
        Description copied from interface: WelcomeScreenPage.OnChangeListener
        Called when this page is coming into view
        Specified by:
        onWelcomeScreenPageScrolled in interface WelcomeScreenPage.OnChangeListener
        Parameters:
        pageIndex - The position index of this page
        offset - The % offset of this page, negative if page is off the screen on the right, positive if off on the left
        offsetPixels - The offset of this page in pixels, negative if page is off the screen on the right, positive if off on the left
